faq.question: Are these courses in Hindi or English?
faq.answer: Courses are primarily in Hindi, but they use English in appropriate places.

faq.question: Are these courses pre-recorded or live?
faq.answer: These are pre-recorded courses with lifetime access.

faq.question: Will I get a certificate of completion?
faq.answer: Yes, you will get the Certificate of Completion upon completing the course.

faq.question: How to access these courses after payment?
faq.answer: After payment, you will get a login link and credentials on your WhatsApp number and mail. There you can access your courses.

faq.question: Are these courses focused on investors or traders?
faq.answer: This course is focused on long-term investors, except for The Foundation Course On Options (Beginners) which is for Beginner Option Trader.

faq.question: For what duration am I getting the courses?
faq.answer: This course comes with lifetime access.

faq.question: Can I get a GST Invoice for this course?
faq.answer: Yes, you will get a GST invoice. If you need Input Tax Credit you need to provide your GST Number and contact our support team.

faq.question: Can I get a refund, if I donâ€™t like the courses?
faq.answer: Yes, you can opt for a full refund anytime within 5 days of purchase. To request a refund just write a mail to support@convey.in

faq.question: Do these courses include technical analysis (Charts and indicators)?
faq.answer: These courses are designed for investors and not for traders, hence they don't need technical analysis. Except for The Foundation Course On Options (Beginners) which is for Beginner Option Trader.
